author: mtosi
body:
as it is done in #20620,
rollback HLTDQM, in order to make tier0 jobs safe while keeping the plots in the workflows run for the validation (as requested at the Join Opt Meeting 2017.10.20 [1])

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lG7r2OCBWz7dVl7aaUczNT4DvGQJlmOy-ciS2lBhZvw/edit#heading=h.7oamqr4y3fpf
title: Join Opt Meeting 2017.10.20 action item : rollback HLTDQM
